fmiModelDescription.description: A Dummy FMU for testing. The Dummy takes a value read_data and adds an increment of 1 to it during every timestep. The result is stored in the variable write_data. Please note: The Model Exchange version of this FMU has not been implemented. Use the Co-Simulation version of the FMU or implement the model.

ScalarVariable.name: write_data
ScalarVariable.description: Write data, which is obtained as write_data = read_data + increment

ScalarVariable.name: increment
ScalarVariable.description: The increment added during every time step
